desc: Deck Tile Direct has been importing and distributing the finest modular outdoor flooring solutions for homeowners, architects and designers for over 15 years. Porcelain Pavers, Structural Hardwood Pavers, Raised Pedestal decking and Interlocking deck tiles and now FRP grating, has always been our specialty.

layout.text: Outdoor deck tile flooring solutions for over 15 years, call or email us for a quote
